articles.title: Golden retriever puppies with potentially deadly virus found abandoned in Boston
articles.description:
One of the dogs, named Big Red, will be up for adoption once the virus and gastrointestinal parasites clear his system.

The post Golden retriever puppies with potentially deadly virus found abandoned in Boston appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Jerry quits Ben & Jerry’s, saying its independence on social issues has been stifled
articles.description:
Ben & Jerry's has been at odds with Unilever for a while. In March Ben & Jerry’s said that its CEO was unlawfully removed by Unilever in retaliation for the ice cream maker’s social and political activism.

The post Jerry quits Ben & Jerry’s, saying its independence on social issues has been stifled appeared first on Boston.com.
